page.title: 20MILL HILL COMMUNITY CENTRE.
page.content: Originally a Victorian{church and {school}built in the years 1847,1870 and 1904,it closed as a school in March,1974 and re-opened as a {Community Centre}in{September,1974 with the United Reform Church remaining as an integral part of the building.The centre is open{seven days each week,from{9.00am to 10.00pm}and{ {activities}include playgroups, childminders,mother and toddler club, junior and senior youth clubs,snooker room(for pensioners,youth club and unemployed) Judo,Karate,self defence, Amateur Wrestling,Ladies Keep Fit, Computer and Slimming Clubs,Whist, Bingo and Old Time Dancing.Girls Majorette Troupe,Men's Table Tennis Leaque Teams and a Community Arts Project(Action Factory)which does Street Theatre,Music Workshops,Out Door Murals and photography.
